revised_title: Thomas Wallace: A Life Devoted to Agricultural and Horticultural Science
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Science
tldr: Thomas Wallace was a talented scientist who specialized in agricultural and horticultural research. He made significant contributions to understanding the effects of mineral deficiencies on plants, helping farmers improve their crops and solve problems like leaf scorch. Wallace's work also involved studying the impact of trace elements on plants, and he played a role in the development of the agricultural research field.
